Chaves Street is a fighting game for Windows independently created by staff Cyber Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Gamba , with the show pesonagens Keys Mexican -style fighting game like Street Fighter consecrated , Art of Fighting , Darkstalkers and The King of Fighters , companies like CAPCOM and SNK . It was created in 2003 by the team CyberGamba , the game is currently in version 1.5a .

The game can be played by 1 or 2 people using the keyboard or a joystick . In 1 player mode , the selected character must defeat all the other characters in the village and face what seems to be the main rival of this character . The game has several hits , projectiles , special techniques and even items that are thrown into the middle of the fight .

Street Chaves was well publicized at the time of its release , with cover of magazines and newspapers games . The game is free and can be downloaded from the website ( s ) Developer ( s) or many other sites related to Mexican series .
